Determine the slope of the tangent line to y = g(x) at the value x = 2.

Find an equation for the tangent line to y = g(x) at the point (2,g(2)). Write your result in point-slope formRecall that a line with slope m that passes through (x_0,y_0) has equation y - y_0 = m(x - x_0), and this is the point-slope form of the equation..
